getFontScale().name: getFontScale()
getFontScale().documentation: Returns 1.0 as default or the most recent value passed to {@link #setFontScale()}

isEnabled().name: isEnabled()
isEnabled().documentation: Returns false or the most recent value passed to {@link #setEnabled(boolean)}

setEnabled(boolean).name: setEnabled(boolean)
setEnabled(boolean).documentation: Sets the value to be returned by {@link CaptioningManager#isEnabled()}

setFontScale(float).name: setFontScale(float)
setFontScale(float).documentation: Sets the value to be returned by {@link CaptioningManager#getFontScale()}
